situations.title: Just a friend request 👨‍👧
situations.description: You wake up, you have a friend request on TikTok - but actually, you think that you were already friends on that platform. Do you accept the friend request again?

situations.title: Reset a password 🔑
situations.description: At school you have forgotten the password to your school email. To create a new password you get a message with a link to re-set. Is it safe to click that link?

situations.title: Use that password 💻
situations.description: You clicked the link to set a new password on your school email and now have to choose a new password. The page lets you use a combination of your first name and your birth date as a password. Great! An easy to remember password. Let's use it!

situations.title: Get some Lego! 🤑
situations.description: You just got home from school and want to buy that new Lego online. On the official shop, it's over 200 Euros 🙁 But fortunately, you find it for 85 Euros on cheap-lego.com.ru. Great opportunity to buy it there, or what would you say?

situations.title: Call back 📞
situations.description: Luckily, you noticed that the site is not trustable. Oh, a call. +599 43 965 4342 calls, but the call ends immediately for some reason. Doesn't matter, just call back, don't you?
